item.description:
The retreat is just around the corner. We have the schedule finalized and are working out the little details. Come to help walk-through workshop ideas and pack materials for the workshops.

TIME: 7 p.m. to 10pm (with an opportunity to stay later if there is an interest!). Come and leave whenever you like.

WHAT TO BRING: Yourself, an open mind and creative ideas. Feel free to bring a snack to share—but that’s entirely optional.

COST: Free

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.) and some supplies including acrylic paints, collage materials, embellishments, paper and more. Access to a microwave, toaster oven, refrigerator, kitchen sink and restroom.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Members only.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Retreat Planning
